Megatron/Quickstrike:





"No!" Megatron snapped at Dark Mouse. "We attack now. The opportunity could 
be for us and we would be wasting it waiting for more troops. We will head 
out to the Predacon base now!"



Quickstrike:


Quickstrike heard the command and readied himself. He transformed to beast 
mode and waited for action.
